ritualSteps.title: Welcome to FocusBee!
ritualSteps.subtitle: Ready to create your focus ritual?
ritualSteps.instruction: Stand up and pick up your phone

ritualSteps.title: Great! Now walk away
ritualSteps.subtitle: Distance creates intention
ritualSteps.instruction: Walk to another room or at least 10 steps away from your workspace

ritualSteps.title: Perfect positioning!
ritualSteps.subtitle: Time to create separation
ritualSteps.instruction: Place your phone in this location and leave it here

ritualSteps.title: Ritual complete!
ritualSteps.subtitle: Your focus zone is activated
ritualSteps.instruction: Return to your workspace. Your phone will stay here as a gentle reminder of your commitment to focus.
